website_summaries.verdict: A great general computer monitor with a minimal bezel around the edge of the screen.
pros: 24-inch size makes the monitor perfect for smaller spaces and cramped desks
Thin design offers more space around the monitor for other accessories and objects
cons: Gaming on the monitor can present some performance challenges due to the slower response rate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this monitor when my original Dell monitor died. First item arrived quickly but was DOA. Return was no hassle. Replacement arrived one week after dead monitor was delivered to vendor. Getting info about the replacement was like pulling teeth. Vendor did not return email and never provided shipment confirmation or tracking. Tilt hinge on monitor stand was very, VERY stiff. Lubricated it with WD40 and used vice grip pliers to wiggle it back and forth. Afraid to tilt monitor for fear of breaking something. Otherwise, very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DisasterDude

customer_reviews.title: how much worse could a computer monitor be?
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I didn't think it was possible to have such an awful monitor, a piece of equipment which should be so simple to operate. Once we finally got through the assembly, we had to stare at this horrible bright picture which we couldn't adjust because the buttons don't work. There was also a weird error message on the screen that we couldn't clear. This is all right out of the box. The thing also just felt flimsy and cheap. Let's just say I'll never be buying anything by this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: emmapeel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has excellent color and clarity. I found it quite easy to assemble with a Phillips screwdriver. The monitor and base are light but sturdy. The monitor is amazingly thin. I have 2 desktops and a laptop for portability. I hate the on-board mouse, keyboard and display on the laptop, so when it's parked at home, I connect it to a Logitech wireless mouse-keyboard combo and a large monitor, this one. Voila, I have a user-friendly laptop desktop that I dearly love. When I travel, I take the laptop and the mouse. Wish I could take the monitor too.
customer_reviews.author: tds

customer_reviews.title: Love it as a second monitor
customer_reviews.text: It is very narrow and fits well where I needed it to and love it as a second monitor. It was easy to assemble (somewhat) had some issues with the little plastic piece on the back, it's like a cover that goes over the screw mount. I have no clue in Hades how I will get it back out as I had to pound on it a little bit to get it in to begin with. Hopefully I will never have to remove it so it won't ever be an issue. I do love the picture quality I have gamed, watched movies and have done drafting and photoshop work on it.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. BlackTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: For all console players READ
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are very good, but if you want to connect it to your console it may cause some confusion. I got this for my ps4 and to get for it to connect you have to connect through HDMI to the monitor, turn the TV on FIRST (you have to do this every time) and then if its your first time, hold down on the ps4 on/off button until it beeps twice (be patient). Then, with the TV still on, turn it on again.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: I love the sleep function
customer_reviews.text: I am a custom-PC nerd with a bunch of monitors and computers. I got this one as a gift to my girlfriend with her new computer, and I must say, it even makes me want to sit down at her desk sometimes. In particular: I love the sleep function. Never have to touch the power button on this monitor, as it seamlessly 'turns off' when the PC powers down and even sleeps when the computer sleeps... Basically I don't know what the specifics are but it happens so flawlessly in the background that I never think about it. Appearance is really nice and overall is very slim and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark X Gravender

customer_reviews.title: AND the glare on the screen is terrible. I have florescent lights in my office and ...
customer_reviews.text: Putting together was a pain. It has these 2 little screws that need a miracle worker to put in and the didn't provide a screw driver. I work at a startup and it was days until my screwdriver came in the mail. AND the glare on the screen is terrible. I have florescent lights in my office and they are terrible with this screen. would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: timjglen

customer_reviews.title: Yes and No on vesa mounting 24” monitors.  Here is how!
customer_reviews.text: Ok a lot of mixed info on vesa mounting the 24” monitors. No they do not have VESA screw holes. No there is not and adapter for them. That being said yes you can VESA mount them. Here is what I figured out before the buy and have now implemented once I got the monitors. It cost about $3.50 for extra nuts and washers at Lowe’s and mounts them rock solid they won’t budge. (The plate comes from a 2 1/2 in u-bolt all other parts are straight forward)
customer_reviews.author: David L. Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is excellent - accessories are cheap / unusable
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is excellent but as with all things made outside of the U.S. you get what you pay for... One of the screws which holds the monitor to the base was made of such a weak material (doesn't even qualify as metal) snapped off when I was screwing it into the hole. No, I did not overtighten it... I was barely applying pressure. Fortunately the monitor is still stable with one screw or I would have been forced to return the entire thing since the screw broke off inside the hole (or else drill / tap the hole, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Public user

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with a banner that will not go away.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor was simple enough to set up. However this banner will not go away and is blocking anything from showing on the screen. Tech support is not open on the weekend and can't find anything on their support site to address this. I've been theough every setting without any success.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: My old monitor was doing annoying things. I nearly bought one at the local big box store, but decided to check Amazon first. I found this monitor at a great price. It came exactly when promised. It was well packaged and easy to set up. I have a two monitor setup, and the picture is so much better on this new monitor that I may replace the second monitor also.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Stabler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for good price. Slight HDMI connection issue
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Great visual quality and perfect for desktop gaming. My only issue with it is a connectivity issues with the HDMI. For some reason, whenever I have it connected to my PS4 and turn it on, it won't connect to the PS4 and say no connection despite having the PS4 set to the correct video output settings. I have to take the HDMI cord and connect it to a TV and manually reenter the video output settings even though they already read the 1920x1080p 60hz. If anyone knows about this issue or how to solve it, I would greatly appreciate some tips. Thanks you
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Viera

customer_reviews.title: VIBRANT PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome, I may have to order two more. I have three monitors on my desk which are all different. I put this one in the middle and it put the other two to shame. I like the thin border and the vibrant colors blew me away. Price is very reasonable also, which is why I'll probably order two more to replace the other two monitors so they all match!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bowmaker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor! Tomorrow is the big test, I’m going to work from home and watch the snow from my desk. Plugging my laptop into it and projecting to it for a bigger work space. I may purchase another so I can have the same dual monitors. I need to figure out what I need to make it work first; I can see this spiraling into an expensive upgrade to a new iPad & all required accessories 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited when I opened the box. The monitors looked beautiful, but when I went to put the stands together, everything fell apart. I'm not sure if it was the threads on the monitor or on the screws, but I was barely able to get the first monitor to take the screw and the second wasn't happening. I thought I'd be able to make do with one screw, but that was a no-go as well. Better screws would have made the difference here. Maybe they can spend the extra couple of cents and fix this problem, but for now, I'm going to have to send them back and go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE VESA MOUNTING!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was wanting, I asked multiple times if this had Vesa mounting and everyone's answer was"YES" and it absolutely does not! I even specified 24" when asking and the answer was still yes. I bought 3 with a 3 armed Vesa stand because of the answers. They are beautiful monitors but sadly they wont fit with my build. All 3 will be returned and I will get 3 "Asus Slim Bezel Black VC239H 23" from right here at Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Good sharp images; fits nicely in space on desk.
customer_reviews.text: Other than small screws that attach stand falling into the hole in the back that were not easily retrieved it was simple to assemble. It is also the first monitor I've found that sits low enough to fit back in the cubby designed for it on my desk. I haven't had it long enough to comment on durability but my experience with multiple other brands is that they tend to outlast the cpu they're attached to.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: There were no issues with getting the monitor to work with my computer. I just plugged it in and it was functioning. The buttons to control the various settings were a little difficult to utilize, but it was nothing major. I highly recommend this item for the quality and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Sabol

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for my laptop when I work at home. It was so easy to attach the stand and connect a couple of cords. I love having a bigger monitor so I can open lots of applications. Definitely makes working from home easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid monitor with a good picture.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely clean monitor. Well packaged, well made, crisp picture, and low glare. The only downside is there are no VESA mounting brackets on the back of the monitor. For my current setup, this is irrelevant. It would also cause the monitr to be much thicker than it is. The stand, base, and back of the monitor are metal.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Schlotter

customer_reviews.title: Great 2nd monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor as a 2nd monitor for my laptop. The image quality is great and it was very easy to set up. The monitor does not have speakers, which I didn't necessarily look for when purchasing but partially wish it did at times. Otherwise, I'm very happy with this purchase and wish I had gotten it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is amazing.  Viotek, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: They are a 3rd party vendor. The monitor would not assemble because the alignment of the skrew holes is not right. The monitor itself is great. It works well. I am not going to return as they are sold out. I called the vendor and they want to send it back and repair rather than replace.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Young

customer_reviews.title: i love it, and so wide and the picture is ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is something that everyone needs to invest in. The screen is so light weight and thin, i love it, and so wide and the picture is very clear. I literally can see everything that I work on for work. I use it in my office and am so pleased with it. People ask about this screen- they saw "wow, is this screen you computer screen? It's so wide, thin and so sleek." I recommend this screen. I'm very happy with my purchase and hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: B. Siaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear screen, and the borderless format works well as a second monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality monitor with a large screen, and takes up little space on my desk. The only thing I don't like about it is that it doesn't tilt - it's solidly attached to the base in one position. Not a big deal - just didn't give it a 5 because of that.
customer_reviews.author: ArwenOrion

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for side-by-side
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to do side-by-side monitors and they did not sit at the same height. And... you cannot adjust the height. Although some may find this minor, it would have bothered me when looking at spreadsheets. It did however come nicely packaged and the screen was very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jer TPA

customer_reviews.title: ULTRA THIN, EASY SET UP, BEST FOR THE $$
customer_reviews.text: I have only had for a few days. I Love it!!! Best deal for the money. Only one issue that I am trying to resolve. When I print while monitor is plugged in, it only prints 3/4 of the page. I’m sure it will be resolved. Used the company chat option and they are working quickly to solve the issue
customer_reviews.author: Seasid4me

customer_reviews.title: Ditto to what another reviewer said. Despite all of ...
customer_reviews.text: Ditto to what another reviewer said. Despite all of the answers that say this has vesa mount capabilities, the one I received did not. There was not a single screw hole on the back. It seems they've removed that feature, so fair warning if that's what you were ordering it for. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor went bad in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor in August of 2018 expected it to last more than 6 months. Today January 19, 2019 this is what it looks like ( see attached picture). Hooked up an older monitor and it works fine. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The Monitor I ordered (24" Viotek HA238) exceeds my expectations. The image is sharp and clear while the unit is light weight and thin. The stand attaches easily and holds the monitor securely. I like the fact it has both a VGA and HDMI connections. I am going to buy another one like it for my home security system.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: After about a year, the screen glitched out. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for little over a year; originally loved this monitor and used it very frequently. About an hour ago, the screen glitch so now it's got a line through it, as well as its definitely tinted lighter and I have no clue why. Also, on the right side there is some noticeable pixelation. This all happened in one second; it was completely fine and then it refreshed and BAM, now it looks like this. I am hesitant to buy this product again, as I don't want to have the same issue next year.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome. I use it with my Mac mini, and now everyone else in the office wants one. Great picture quality for what we do (no image editing, just 3D manipulation besides typical office uses) and it is very thin and professional looking. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Russell M

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Did not work longer we had it for over 6 months and all together We used only few hours, it died does not work any more.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel in the worst place
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it was great. Easy to set up the stand, picture quality was up to par with the given stats/price...everything was great...except one annoying thing...an evil dead pixel center screen to ruin the party. Honestly if it had been in a spot where I didn't stare constantly I would've given 4 stars, 5 without one all together. I'll update the review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for SO for work
customer_reviews.text: My SO is used to using two screens in his office, and when having to work from home one day, was frustrated with his laptop screen not being big enough for all the programs he needs to run during the day. This monitor allows him to extend all of his windows to see everything clearly! He is enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Not top of the line but a very very good picture. Excellent for the office. Feels very cheap but really isn't. I bought these to replace a truly cheap set of monitors and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Died on me after about a year
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about a year. Was never damaged or mistreated. Low quality monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Love that it doesn't look bulky, that is my minimalist side talking. The picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Viotek Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor, excellent conditions, works properly. It's very ergonomic, I wish I could get it 32 inches. But other than that, definitively I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great picture!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, I bought three of them as an upgrade for our business, they are very sleek and have a great picture quality !!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: CheckSum Message won't go away
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this monitor but it had a square checksum message that would not go away. I returned it for a refund. I found a 23" Dell monitor @ Bestbuy for $10 less than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Grant

customer_reviews.title: Connection must be reestablished with every use and picture quality not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Each time I connect my laptop to the external monitor, I have to fiddle with the connection in order for it to work. Additionally, the picture quality is not the best. Font looks a bit fuzzy and pixilated. Its tedious to adjust settings. Overall, not the best but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wow this monitor is great. It has such an attractive appearance and I love the picture quality. Excellent work, Viotek.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 these monitors to replace the monitors in my businesses front office. They are great. The picture quality is fantastic for inputing data and reviewing documents. Im not a gamer so I can't comment on how they are for gaming but I am impressed for the price. Just ordered 2 more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these monitors for an at home dual monitor set up. Great price for 24 inch screens! They arrived quickly and were so easy to set up ! Very satisfied with the quality and large display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... out of the box plugged it in and it’s great! The screen has a little more “shine” to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of the box plugged it in and it’s great! The screen has a little more “shine” to it than a matte screen. But, my desk has a window directly behind me and I don’t notice it at all while the monitor is on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought two of these monitors now and both of them have been working great! The factory settings has the brightness up a little too high but that is easy to adjust. The picture is clear and good quality, and they are easily wide enough to do split screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just got these monitors
customer_reviews.text: The picture on these units is great. The buttons to adjust them could be better, they are located under the bezel of the screen and don't seem to line-up exactly with the icon on the bezel. The screens are light and take up very little desk space. Overall I so far satisfied with the displays.
customer_reviews.author: Nahchon Guyton

customer_reviews.title: AFFORDABLE & EFFICIENT. Best for your $
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Honestly this is the definition of affordable and EFFICIENT. Phenomenal quality. The monitor is so slick and thin it is honestly crazy. Image resolution is bright, & colorful. I have been using it for a week to reflect my macbookpro and have had zero issues. I super recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Elizabeth Soto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation
customer_reviews.text: Vivid colors, using it for security cameras monitor, and it show a very clear and colorful image.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The screws are crap, broke in half upon assembling, but is stuck in the hole. Screens are decent, but assembly is bs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good value and delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the monitor's price point value and very easy assembly. Also, delivered when promised! Well done! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bettee Rousey

customer_reviews.title: it is a slick and good monitor and take up limited space
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me as it relates to the picture quality I was looking to accomplish. However, it is a slick and good monitor and take up limited space.
customer_reviews.author: MY-VU

customer_reviews.title: The display is good but the monitor is poorly built
customer_reviews.text: The display is good but the monitor is poorly built. The base is tightened with two small screws and one of the two broke when assembling. Now the monitor is standing on one screw. I don't think this monitor will last long. Need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Areeba

customer_reviews.title: False bezel thickness, no wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: Has no wall mount capability. The bezel is very thin, but the actual light emitting part of the screen does not extend all the way to the bezel. It's actually quite large gap.
customer_reviews.author: joe kepner

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for desk.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger screen for my MacAir since I am getting older and staring at the small screen was hard on my eyes. The Viotek is the perfect size and works great for those long sessions at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Best

customer_reviews.title: I wish It had more inputs but the quality is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use it my home office as a second monitor for my laptop. I wish It had more inputs but the quality is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ExploringNH

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but I wish you could adjust the stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor but I wish you could adjust the stand and that it came with the required cable...had to spend almost $20 for the darn cable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: 13 yo computer geek approved
customer_reviews.text: My son built a computer at summer camp and this is monitor he wanted to go with.
customer_reviews.author: ellen dedman

customer_reviews.title: What a good monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is crystal clear, very light and quite reliable so far. Glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Galton

customer_reviews.title: Not awful, but don't believe the photos.
customer_reviews.text: Decent picture, but the picture showed VESA Mounts. no VESA Mount, however.
customer_reviews.author: df

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Our first BIG monitor. I love the no edges and the modern simple stand. Colors and details are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joe-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've spent the extra $20 and went with the FreeSync monitor but these are great monitors at a great price. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to purchase this because my laptop screen bit the dust. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SweetP

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Great color, wide screen.....didn't have to make any resolution adjustments on CPU
customer_reviews.author: ecxpa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful screen, the only problem was adjusting to the correct brightness and contrast.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: It looked somehow different...less quality than pictured. Also seemed somehow smaller than 24". Returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: Vapid

customer_reviews.title: Super thin and light !
customer_reviews.text: Super thin and light , great quality and price ! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Large format at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor - large screen size. Automatically formats for the computer system.
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: On time and as expected. Great addition to the computer
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor, clean lines, crisp and vibrant displays. A++
customer_reviews.author: TrooshallP62

customer_reviews.title: From unboxing to connecting
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME monitors. Heavy duty build, light in weight, unbelievable display quality. I really should order two more. Unless Viotek wants to offer a third for my great review. Happy to accept any and all products for testing. BETA TEAM!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor for the price! Eye-popping color, fast refresh rate, easy set up mount, and sleek appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Monitor arrived new in box no damage I'm completely happy and satisfied with my order
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel. It’s very sexy and exactly what I needed and wanted it to be. I wish I bought this earlier rather then the other monitors before it.
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've only had the monitor for a month but I've found absolutely nothing wrong with it and am impressed with the overall quality. Both picture and build quality are on par with two other $500 HP monitors in my office. Would definitely buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect additional monitor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect additional monitor. I use it to add a screen and work from home with my Apple laptop. All you need is a Type C cable. Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Teodora Kamburov

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture Quality all around
customer_reviews.text: In 4K it really shines for the product it is. Nice picture Quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: Craig E. Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Great quality. Would be nice if the monitor tilted vertically. Also would be nice to have the monitor slide up and down like some models I have seen (HP). Overall great monitor and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price! I plug my laptop in via hdmi port and it works great! Monitor a little low so I needed to buy a shelf. Otherwise so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Much of time it will not recognize an HDMI cable ...
customer_reviews.text: Much of time it will not recognize an HDMI cable. It has been frustrating and this wi probably end up at a second hand store.
customer_reviews.author: FJS3

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal Lines
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor September 2017, I turned the monitor on this morning and I'm seeing a black horizontal line and evenly spaced gray horizontal line across the whole screen. Dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri W. Ponirakis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I received the monitor in a timely manner and it works as advertised. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this monitor. only wish it had a speaker embedded within it.
customer_reviews.author: gtownhoya

customer_reviews.title: It’s not vesa mountable
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor. But why show pictures of the monitor mounted on the wall if it actually can’t be mounted... you have to scroll all the way down and look at features to see its not the mountable model
customer_reviews.author: David Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to pair with my Mac Mini. Its picture quality is great. No regrets this far!
customer_reviews.author: KBay67

customer_reviews.title: Picture is very nice. thank you
customer_reviews.text: Very slim, very light. You can use this monitor for anything with the HDMI port. Picture is very nice. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Catmull

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Thin, light, cheap, looks good. Not top of the line, but very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berning

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this monitor! Even though its not a big brand, it performed as well if not better than them. Great size for a great price. I fully recommend this 24" to anymore looking for a beautiful monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor and delivered fast
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor for my wife and she loves it. I've only had it less than a week but may have to buy one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. For the price these screens are very modern and sleek. I bought two and I’m absolutely amazed. You won’t be let down.
customer_reviews.author: M. Khan

customer_reviews.title: No dead pixels and not too bad for gaming (casual players)
customer_reviews.text: For now 5 stars. No dead pixels and not too bad for gaming (casual players). Haven't tested in max settings on CSGO or PUBG. Good monitor for this price tag. More than enough for MOBA.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik Rajamanickam

customer_reviews.title: great image, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: it arrived on time, guess I'm missing the webcam and no speakers. Everything else is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador M. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this product. Very good monitor for a very good price. Will be getting a second and maybe a third when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Satyr

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: The screen is damaged. Has a white box in the corner that never goes away. The screensaver does not work. instead it flashes red green and blue. Awful; cheap 3rd part product do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Riles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this product. Bought two for my home desktop. Easy to assemble and connect.
customer_reviews.author: robert montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this monitor for gaming and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this monitor for gaming and so far everything comes in very clean. The stand also looks a little fancy and adds a higher end look to my set up. I have no worries that this monitor will last me
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: so far it's been working pretty well, just a heads up, it does not include an HDMI cable in order to connect to your pc, so be sure to have one ready
customer_reviews.author: Nhi

customer_reviews.title: Good screens
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was delayed, but when they got here they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: David Urry

customer_reviews.title: great size
customer_reviews.text: used this to replace dual monitors. takes up less desk space and does the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Terry Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping packed well. excellent lllquality picture and easy to set up. Great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

product_meta.title: 24” VIOTEK HA238 Ultra-Thin Computer Monitor – 1920x1080p with Bezel-Less Frame, 16:9 Widescreen & HDMI Connection
feature_bullets: ULTRA-THIN DESIGN – This 24 inch monitor features an ultra-thin design and is just .13 inches thick for a sleek aesthetic
BEZEL-LESS -This bezel-less HD monitor comes with a display that runs up right to the edges of the monitor for a sharper look
MULTIPLE CONNECTVITY OPTIONS- The VIOTEK PC monitor allows you to choose between connecting via VGA and HDMI cables
1920x1080 pixels, 60hz – The Viotek Computer screen comes with stunning 1920x1080 resolution for a clean, clear, and crisp image
16:9, 14ms, 2,000,000:1- Widescreen format, response time, & dynamic contrast help create a more cinematographic feel (Please Note: this model is not VESA wall mountable)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
